Articles.Content: Is there a mod out there that adds the ability to show two or more views at once, i.e. map view in one window, IVA in another? If not, is it possible to start up two instances of the game that are "linked", so to speak?

i think there is two mods can do this, one came with some parts you put it on your ship then use a web bowers to view some information&flight date, another require you have two same ksp install, one you put a sever in there another you put a client in there, then you launch the sever one first then launch the client one so you got two windows one you play on it another as a map/ tracking station view.

 

Edited March 13, 2016 by nathamxu
